issue.title: [Python] Segmentation fault on conversion of empty array to Pandas

***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-2129](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-2129). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
